summary: Jespar gets a new armor,a new weapon and a new fighting style.
descriptionHtml:
Changes Jespar Dal' Varek's armor,weapon and fighting style.His armor is more elegant and mercenary like.He fights one handed with a sword instead of his vanilla two dagger style.Now he is more of swashbuckler than a rogue.

PS.The sword has the statistics of the iron sword.I did not want Jespar to become too powerful and spoil your fun.


[b][u]Issues:
[/u][/b]
Minimal clipping of the (small yellow) shirt colar when Jespar moves his neck.

[b][u]Credits:[/u]

trinkof,[/b]Nights Watch Armor.

[b]Kimono[/b],Witchers Silver Sword
author: Medtech
